description: Scaffold the AI framework that creates specialized Ollama models

tasks.description: Core framework structure with base classes, configuration system, and model management
tasks.spec: Create the foundation: BaseModel abstract class for all models, Config class for model parameters, ModelManager for lifecycle management, custom exceptions

tasks.description: Training pipeline for creating and fine-tuning models
tasks.spec: Build training infrastructure: FineTuner for model adaptation, PromptEngineer for system prompts, ModelBuilder for Ollama modelfile generation, DatasetLoader for training data

tasks.description: Runtime and deployment system for serving models
tasks.spec: Create runtime: OllamaInterface for model operations, InferenceEngine for predictions, ModelServer for API, CacheManager for response caching
Complete package: README with architecture, setup.py for installation, comprehensive tests for all modules, usage documentation, example scripts
